Title: Flaw in the method_missing implementation
Description: The issue is triggered when handling exec commands called via send(). This may allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.3.0 before 1.3.1, all versions starting from 1.2.0 before 1.2.2, all versions starting from 1.1.0 before 1.1.1, all versions starting from 1.0.0 before 1.0.4
